definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
(slang) (of women) to hunt for rich, attractive guys

sentences.english: It was important to get a good result before the Celtic tie.
sentences.chinese: 在对阵凯子的欧冠比赛前，获得一场大胜是如此重要。

sentences.english: Boston punishes teams that don't make quick decisions with the ball.
sentences.chinese: 凯子狠狠的揍了一顿那些不能很快处理球的球队。

sentences.english: The team that finally broke the Celtics' curse.
sentences.chinese: 那赛季的湖人终于打破凯子的魔咒。

sentences.english: A lot of folks must be overpaying.
sentences.chinese: 这么说来，一定有一票人当了凯子。

sentences.english: The Celtics teams they battled were heavy in Hall of Famers, too.
sentences.chinese: 那时的凯子也有一大堆人都入选了名人堂。

sentences.english: It's not surprising the Celtics turned it around so dramatically, winning their last 10.
sentences.chinese: 凯子突然戏剧般的状态大勇，已经10连胜了。

definition: (slang) (of women) to hunt for rich, attractive guys
spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
to pick up girls/to play around with girls/to chase after girls
to open one's eyes wide at the sight of profit (idiom); thinking of nothing but personal gain/money-grubbing
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
